name: plan-chooser.mermaid
content:
flowchart TD
  A[Public site: Click Get Started] --> B[Choose Plan: Free / Pro / Publisher]

  B -- Free --> C[Redirect to Clerk signup email+PW or Google]
  C --> D[After verification: Create Personal org]
  D --> Z[Route to Create New Song]

  B -- Pro --> E[Redirect to Clerk signup email+PW or Google]
  E --> F[After verification: Checkout page]
  F --> G{Payment successful?}
  G -- No --> H[Show error, allow retry]
  G -- Yes --> I[Create Personal org with Pro tier]
  I --> J[Send receipt + welcome email]
  J --> Z[Route to Create New Song]

  B -- Publisher --> K[Redirect to Clerk signup email+PW or Google]
  K --> L[After verification: Checkout page]
  L
